scripts.start: concurrently "cd app1; yarn dev" "cd app2; yarn dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd app1; yarn build" "cd app2; yarn build"
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd app1; yarn serve" "cd app2; yarn serve"
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd app1; yarn reset" "cd app2; yarn reset"
scripts.e2e:ci: yarn start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
